DOC.brief_summary: A study bioavailability insulin infusion duodenum healthy volunteer .
DOC.detailed_description: METHODOLOGY All subject admit fast Clinical Trial Unit Ã…rhus Community Hospital 8 a.m. A Gastrointestinal tube place Duodenum distal papilla Vaterii pH approximately 7.0 measure pH meter distal tube . An indwelling catheter glucose infusion ( 20 % ) case hypoglycaemia place antecubital vein . In contralateral anticubital vein catheter place blood sampling . All subject 4 test duodenal infusion insulin Aspart solution . The first 4 volunteer receive 4 dos insulin Aspart solution 1 ml ( 150 , 300 , 600 1000 IU ) 3-6 hour apart . Blood sample Insulin Aspart , total insulin , glucose ( Beckmann apparatus ) do every 10 minute first two hour , every 20 minute . When final subject receive meal leave hospital . Based data pilot dose determine remain 8 subject . These base result pilot two separate study day receive 4 infusion 3-6 hour split . Two infusion pH 7 two infusion proximal pH 5.5 ( two different insulin concentration dose give two place Duodenum ) . Frequency interval blood sample second part determine result pilot study . For comparison clinical situation estimation bioavailability subject receive subcutaneous intravenous ( iv ) bolus injection 6 IU insulin Aspart . The iv injection follow blood sample three hour , every 5 minute first two hour , sc injection follow blood sample three hour , 10 minute interval first two hour .
DOC.criteria: Signed informed consent Healthy Volunteers Age > 18 < 50 year BMI 1830 kg/m2 Any history gastrointestinal endocrine disorder ( e.g . diabetes mellitus ) pregnancy nursing suspect know allergy towards drug Participation research trial within 3 month study
